skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: reserve bot
Developer Terms of Use
des:
REZRV is a patented technology that applies bandwidth management policies by measuring and controlling all communication (traffic, packets) on the network. Eliminate lagging, congestion and poor performance for your preferred applications over the network. REZRV policies can be managed from the cloud, allowing dynamic updates for changing business needs.

- Enhanced Video Streaming Experience over Wi-Fi.
- AI & ML Based Bandwidth Management.
- Steady Reliable Connectivity for IoT Devices.
- Improved Wi-Fi Signal at Distance.
- Reduced Packet Jitter while Streaming. 

For simple and easy voice based control over the REZRV Router's functionalities. 
Users can perform a wide range of actions like block-unblock applications, prioritize preferred apps, run internet speed test, check bandwidth consumed by different apps, etc.
Example Phrases
- Turn off Netflix for Sara
- Prioritize Netflix for James
- Pause internet for Mark
- Run a speed test 
- Turn on Gaming Mode
